verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Verse:
You've numbered every hair on my head
You know my every thought You know my every thought
My name is on the palm of your hand
And your hands they hold the stars Your hands they hold the stars

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pre Chorus:
Though you're infinite in wisdom
Powerful and mighty still you call me your friend
Though you're seated in the heavens
King over creation still you call me your friend

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I have cried out and you have heard me
You Am know my name You know my name
I was lost and then you came and found me
You Am know my name You know my name

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse:
Your perfect love is better than life
And Your mercy never ends and Your mercy never ends
Like a Father You have opened Your arms
And You've called me back again and You've called me back again

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
You see me You hear me
You know me God and your thoughts can not be numbered
You see me You hear me
You know me God and your thoughts can not be numbered
